page.title: 06Life in Pevensey Bay.
page.content: Mr Stiff is{a retired pharmacist}and he and his wife moved to be near his family.The Stiffs live in a three bedroomed house with a fairly large back garden .In the front is a smaller garden with a pond. Sometimes herons eat the goldfish in this pond. There is one main living room with dining room and a conservatory.The kitchen is a moderate size and Mrs Stiff cooks by electricity .The conservatory is a play area for the grand children.There is a lavatory in both storeys.The house is comfortably furnished with family ornaments and Mr Stiff has photos of his father's saddlers shop. This couple enjoy living in the Bay and think that local shopping is good.In nearby Eastbourne are many amenities.The Stiffs own and drive a car at present but say that public transport is poor.
